summary: You wanna look cool in Skyrim? This is your chance :)
descriptionHtml:
This is for all cool mages who wear cloths only.

I made brown and white vintage sneakers. The white sneakers look nice with the apprentice robe.
After you decided which color you want and copied the file into your textures folder, you can buy them in the Radiant Raiment shop in Solitude.
The shoes are for males.

CHECK OUT MY NIKE SNEAKERS!

Have fun :)
author: Rhage87
